    • Method Detail

      • charge

        VtResponse charge(VtDirectChargeRequest vtDirectChargeRequest)
           throws RestClientException
        Send a payment charge requests to Veritrans.
        Parameters:
        vtDirectChargeRequest - Veritrans charging message request. Credit card request, bank transfer request, mandiri clickpay request. cimb clicks request, or bri epay request.
        Returns:
        Veritrans response
        Throws:
        RestClientException - when an exception was occurred during executing the request.

      • capture

        VtResponse capture(java.lang.String transactionId,
                   java.lang.Long amount)
            throws RestClientException
        Capture a previously authorized credit card charge request.
        Parameters:
        transactionId - Transaction id of authorized request
        amount - Total amount that will be captured (less or equal then authorized gross amount)
        Returns:
        Veritrans response
        Throws:
        RestClientException - when an exception was occurred during executing the request.
